name: Jelly Heroes
description:
Are you brave enough to defeat the evil Jelly Villains and help your trust worthy friends the Jelly Heroes.

Join forces with the Jelly Heroes and help save the day.

Play through hundreds of levels of splashing and matching jelly fun!

Take on this Jellytastic story alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Jelly Heroes is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

Jelly Heroes features:

● Collect all kinds of items to win the level before you run out of moves
● Rechargable boosters, special power ups to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels to complete - more added every 2 weeks!
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet


Follow us to get news and updates:
facebook.com/PlayJellyHeroes
www.jellyheroes.com

Have fun playing Jelly Heroes!
